data_audit_status = #{dataAuditStatus ,jdbcType=TINYINT}, data_audit_time = #{dataAuditTime ,jdbcType=BIGINT}, auth_id = #{authId ,jdbcType=BIGINT}, in_shop_open_id = #{inShopOpenId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_shop_member_id = #{inShopMemberId ,jdbcType=BIGINT}, wxa_business_type = #{wxaBusinessType ,jdbcType=TINYINT} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update yjj_StoreBusiness set BindWeixinName = #{bindWeixinName}, BindWeixinId = #{bindWeixinId}, BindWeixinIcon = #{bindWeixinIcon}, UpdateTime = unix_timestamp()*1000 where Id = #{id} and (BindWeixinId is null or BindWeixinId = '')
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(`share_qr_code_url`, "") AS shareQcCodeUrl, id AS id from `yjj_store_wxa_shop_audit_data` where `store_id`=#{storeId} and `del_status`=0
